page.title: 05ECOLOGY - FOOTPATHS
page.content: Thirty-one registered footpaths are found in this area. Some are still used but some are overgrown due to the advent of the motor car. These footpaths come under the Llangyndeirne Community Council. FOOTPATH 30/43 Blaengain Cottage to Penyrheol starts on B4306 (Pontyberem-Carmarthen) road crosses openland to Penyrheol. FOOTPATH 30/44 Penyrheol to Pantyryn starts at minor road through fields to Pantyryn. FOOTPATH 30/45 Crwbin to Sychnant starts from B4306 passing Henblas and Garnganol farms, through fields to Sychnant. FOOTPATH 30/46 Henblas to Llwynbustach starts from footpath 30/45 near Henblas, goes through fields to Llwynbustach.
